Estimate and Forecast Smoking Quitting

Source: R/estimate_quitting.R
estimate_quitting.Rd

1. Trend fitting & Mortality calculation. 2. Historical Quit Solver. 3. Forecasts Quit rates (continuing trend). 4. Forecasts 'No Initiation' Quit rates (counterfactual).

Usage

estimate_quitting(config, survey_data, tob_mort_data, tob_mort_data_cause)

Developed by Duncan Gillespie, Laura Webster, Grace Leeming, Magdalena Opazo-Breton, Alan Brennan.

Site built with pkgdown 2.1.3.
